content.webTitle: Bar of the week : Umbaba, Ganton Street, London W1 (020 7734 6696)

fields.headline: Bar of the week
fields.bodyText: Umbaba, Ganton Street, London W1 (020 7734 6696) The concept behind the uber-cool Umbaba is genius: the interior is themed as a fictional African country. Influences from Morocco to Zimbabwe create a tribal-inspired design that provides a long-awaited change from the Ikea-esque minimalism that prevails elsewhere. Comprising linked passageways, tiered levels and tent-draped lounge areas, Umbaba has the air of a secret garden. Expect to pay £9.50 for a Republique Du Person original cocktail, and to see a wealth of heiress wannabes. Umbaba doesn't have a VIP area - the whole place is VIP.
